function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Positive relationship between electricity usage and perceived climate change issues","Impact":"Misunderstanding of climate change causation and impact","Mitigation":"Education on the complex factors contributing to climate change","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools for monitoring electricity usage","People":"General public, policy makers","Owner":"Educational institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Changes in adoption intention for HEMS energy and wellbeing features during pandemic","Impact":"Mismatched resource allocation and service delivery","Mitigation":"Adaptation of service offerings to align with changing adoption intentions","Technologies":"Data analytics for predicting adoption patterns","People":"Service providers, public health officials","Owner":"HEMS providers, government agencies"}]}
